name: Maximum Craft: Ultimate Edition
description:
A boundless world from wild forests to winter expanses, start playing in survival mode and create your first pickaxe, explore caves and mines, extract ore and other minerals, build your new home, and make new friends! The game contains many different blocks for the construction of unique structures, a variety of interior items will help you decorate your home.
Implement your dreams in a creative mode, where all the blocks and furniture with the interior are available, the flight mode and complete freedom of action will not let you get bored!
A variety of biomes: summer with forests and fields, winter biomes, desert, highlands with caves, oceans, rivers and seas with beaches, and many other interesting generations of the game world.
Meet new game characters, talk, play together!
